name: Dragon Hunt Adventure for Playdate
description:
Dragon Hunt Adventure is a little adventure (you might guessed it) game for cranky handheld Playdate set in a classic rpg fantasy world with a king, a princess, a giant dragon, knights, a brave hero and secrets to find.

Dragon Hunt Adventure is made by me, TenBoe, with Playdate Pulp. I never made a game before, but this first try is completely written and designed by myself including graphics and sound.

Dragon Hunt Adventure is available for free in 4 versions (click here for a guide to sideload it on your Playdate device):

  • Dragon Hunt Adventure (english, original)
  • Dragon Hunt Adventure Children Edition (a version for kids in english)
  • Dragon Hunt Adventure German (deutsch, original)
  • Dragon Hunt Adventure Junior Version (deutsch, a version for kids in german)

I highly recommend to play the classic versions only 16 years plus. The children’s versions are recommended for parents playing together with kids between maybe 4 - 10 years (you know your kids best and decide after playing it solo first). 

Please do not let your kids play the original versions! 

For bug reporting and any questions feel free to contact us via support@tenboe-media.com

Thank you so much for playing.

My next project is about to start soon …! To keep in touch, follow on Twitter: @TenboeM & Instagram: @tenboemedia
